content.rendered:
Help

The Help Menu of Bibledit Bible Translation Software

gives detailed information about the various Bible Translation Tools. These are suitable for translation and revision of any Bible on any device.

Also visit the following for extra support:

  • INSTALLATION page
  • Video Tutorials
  • Bibledit Forum
  • Demo of Bibledit Software

  • Introduction
  • Installation
  • Methodology
  • Navigation
  • Keyboard shortcuts
  • Screen swiping
  • Consultations
  • Consistency
  • Checks
  • Teams
  • Typesetting
  • Tips and tricks
  • About

Home
Review
Support
Videos
